biotools.summary: DCHap is a fast and accurate haplotype phasing tool for third-generation sequencing data. It works for both SMRT reads (PacBio) and Oxford Nanopore reads.

bioschemas.name: DCHap
bioschemas.summary: DCHap is a fast and accurate haplotype phasing tool for third-generation sequencing data. It works for both SMRT reads (PacBio) and Oxford Nanopore reads.
